name: search_by_genre
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool advanced_movie_search.
Tool description: Search for movies via advanced queries like genre, name, etc. And get all their details
API description: Discover movies by genre using the RapidAPI.

with_genres.description: The genre code to filter movies by. Defaults to '80'.

page.description: The page number of results to retrieve. Defaults to 1.
